lead_paragraph: In a 1973 court filing, Donald Trump denied allegations by the government that Trump Management had engaged in racial bias in its renting of apartments. The document was contained in the National Archives.

headline.main: Affidavit of Donald Trump in 1973 About the Housing Bias Case
